Name: team_has_scrum_master
Description: Every active team must have exactly one Scrum Master assigned.

Name: team_has_product_owner
Description: Every active team must have exactly one Product Owner assigned.

Name: feature_has_acceptance_criteria
Description: No user story can be planned for a sprint without defined acceptance criteria.

Name: sprint_duration_fixed
Description: The duration of a sprint (end_date - start_date) must be exactly 2 weeks (10080 minutes).

Name: budget_not_exceeded
Description: The total cost of all tasks in a project must not exceed the project's budget.

Name: worker_availability_limit
Description: No individual worker can be assigned tasks that exceed their stated availability.

Name: skill_requirement_met
Description: A task requiring a specific skill and level can only be assigned to a worker with that skill at that level.

Name: story_points_capacity
Description: The total story points of user stories committed to a sprint must not exceed the team's known velocity.
